Leandro Francisco Moretti Sanchez

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/0704477226961603
  • Última atualização do currículo em 06/07/2019

Atualmente doutorando da Université Laval (Canadá), possui graduação em Engenharia Civil pela Escola de Engenharia Mauá (2004) e mestrado em Engenharia Civil pela Escola Politécnica da Universidade de São Paulo (2008). Tem experiência na área de Engenharia Civil, com ênfase em tecnologia de materiais e patologia de estruturas (Texto informado pelo autor)

Projetos de pesquisa
2019 - Atual
Artificial Intelligence for Condition Assessment of Critical Infrastructure: Challenges, Risks and Rewards
Descrição: The proposed project is a unique opportunity to develop tools that will build upon the current state-of the art of dealing with aging critical infrastructure. It offers a chance to bring critically needed first warning to communities which are otherwise at high risk from insufficiently assessed aging infrastructure. Since the eventual utilization of the above tools will largely depend on their reliability, an additional, important component of the research will require validation of the proposed automated tools through the assessment of real structures exposed to distinct macro-climates. However, the research team, through their deep involvements in technical committees, will leverage a network of collaborators in North-America, South-America and Europe, where concrete structures affected by various deterioration mechanisms have been already identified and monitored over years of field and laboratory activities. Hence, the project team will have access to a large source of information in the form of existing as well as additional specimens, thus alleviating the above risks associated to the project and providing a unique opportunity to develop tools that will revolutionize the monitoring and management of critical infrastructure..
Situação: Em andamento; Natureza: Pesquisa.

Integrantes: Leandro Francisco Moretti Sanchez - Coordenador / Benoit Fournier - Integrante / Primoz Skraba - Integrante / Anthea Monod - Integrante / Maia Fraser - Integrante / Josée Duschene - Integrante / Bård Pedersen - Integrante / Jan Lindgard - Integrante / Ricardo Pieralisi - Integrante / Marcelo Henrique Farias de Medeiros - Integrante.
